column5: This very unique charming home is one of the closes free standing homes you will find to downtown Dallas. It is close to Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center, American Airlines Center and may other attractions downtown. Easy access to public transit and major highways. It's a convenient and save location. Early or late checkout may be available.  House is cleaned between each guest and all linens washed, no clutter and has everything you need. Make it completely your home for your stay.
